channel.title: Need help editing
channel.description: can some1 tell me how 2 make an npc say "owner is online"..."owner is offline"?

item.title: Need help editing
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

allstar93:

i have that same 1 on mine wit the misc.random2(10) and nuttin hapens wit all the stuff filled in…and wat npc says that?

misc.random2, all that means is that it will randomly say it within 10 seconds of time, or just replace it with this

if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {

Read full topic

item.title: Need help editing
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

allstar93:

i have that same 1 on mine wit the misc.random2(10) and nuttin hapens wit all the stuff filled in…and wat npc says that?

If you would notice the ‘npcType == 2253’ the number there tells you which NPC will say this. You have to spawn an NPC of this ID, or change the ID.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help editing
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

use this one, There might be an extra or not enough brackets tho i quickly C&P’d it…

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Slipknot")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Slipknot Be Owner"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Slipknot Be Owner"; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help editing
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

you need to add this in npchandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("[b]YOUR NAME[/b]")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner [b]YOUR NAME [/b] is Online! Wooo!"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner [b]YOUR NAME [/b] is offline..damit"; } } }

Read full topic
